item.title: Lenovo's robot concept can help you digitally sign documents (and maybe annoy coworkers)
item.description: Lenovo can make a robot, too. Alongside proof-of-concept foldable gaming PCs and modular laptops, it introduced the AI Workmate Concept at MWC 2026. With its own Intel Core Ultra processor, 64GB of memory and its own Pico projector, it’s an AI-laced “workmate” meant to streamline office tasks and collaboration. And it has an LCD face. For now, it’s a proof of concept, musing on how to integrate voice commands and LLMs (large language models) into workplace settings. item.title: Lenovo unveils the 2026 refresh of its Yoga 9i 2-in-1 convertible laptop at MWC
item.description: Lenovo has given the Yoga 9i 2-in-1 Aura Edition a refresh for 2026 and launched the new device at this year’s Mobile World Congress. The convertible laptop comes with a new Canvas Mode when the Yoga Pen Gen 2 case it’s bundled with is attached to the A-cover. item.title: Lenovo's ThinkPads get a spec bump at MWC 2026
item.description: Lenovo is updating its business-focused laptop lineup at MWC 2026. The best-selling ThinkPad T-series is getting a full refresh, and there's an updated ThinkBook 2-in-1 and an all-new Android tablet.The ThinkPad T-Series, the backbone of Lenovo's business PC lineup, now (optionally) ships with a 5MP camera that supports computer vision and vHDR. item.title: Lenovo’s latest gaming tablet goes big on battery
item.description: Lenovo’s buzziest gaming-related MWC announcement is undoubtedly its foldable Legion Go handheld-cum-laptop hybrid, which you can read all about here. But that wasn’t all the company showed off. We’re also getting an updated Legion Tab, Lenovo’s powerful gaming tablet. Like the Gen 4 and 3 models before it, the latest Legion Tab features an 8.8-inch LCD display with an 165Hz refresh rate. The 3K panel can get up to 600 nits of brightness. item.title: The Lenovo Legion Go Fold gaming handheld concept looks awkward but its versatility is endless
item.description: Lenovo already has a large roster of gaming handhelds. However, it seems there's always room for another because at MWC the company showed off an ambitious concept device based around a flexible OLED display. And while the whole setup looks ungainly, after getting my hands on it, I'm very intrigued by its adaptability. Now I'll be the first to admit that an 11.6-inch display feels oversized on a handheld that, in theory, is meant to be somewhat portable. That said, the beauty of the Legion Go Fold's screen is that it can be bent in half to create a more appropriately-sized 7.7-inch panel. In t...

item.title: The Lenovo Modular AI PC concept is a remixed dual-screen laptop with hot swappable ports
item.description: The potential of modular laptops has never fully translated to the real world. While companies like Framework have made major strides in recent years, there's still quite a bit of room for improvement. At MWC, Lenovo is looking to address that with its Modular AI PC concept. It features not one but two displays and a detachable keyboard to create something that strains the definition of a laptop, thanks to an innovative and very adaptable design.Compared to Framework's gadgets, which primarily use modularity to make upgrading the system and extending its lifespan easier, Lenovo's concept is ba...

item.title: Mettre un robot dans un smartphone, Honor l’a fait et le résultat est bluffant
item.description: On a enfin vu le Robot Phone de Honor, cet appareil hybride qui mêle téléphonie mobile et robotique. Équipé d'une intelligence artificielle multimodale capable de comprendre son environnement, ce terminal n'est plus un concept, il arrive dans le commerce.

item.title: On a vu le robot de Honor faire un salto arrière au MWC, et c’est aussi impressionnant qu’effrayant
item.description: Honor a fait son show aujourd'hui à Barcelone. On s'y était préparé, mais le constructeur chinois a tout de même déployé les grands moyens au MWC 2026. Il a délaissé quelques instants ses smartphones pour faire monter sur scène son premier robot humanoïde.

item.title: Best Buy Canada seemingly just leaked Sonos' next portable speaker
item.description: A product briefly posted on the Canadian Best Buy website this weekend suggests Sonos may soon announce a new portable speaker called the Sonos Play. The speaker offers Wi-Fi and Bluetooth connectivity, AirPlay 2 support, Trueplay to tune the sound based on wherever you've placed it and voice controls, according to a page that's since been removed.
